name: Tap Legend (Alpha)
description:
You've got the power! The energy flows through the wires! It's your job to maintain it and become a true Tap Legend!

Current version: 2019-03.7

Tap Legend is a mobile rhythm game that's fully compatible with the .chart format, and further compatibility with .mid and other formats is planned for future releases. The game is slated for initial release in 2020 for Android and a few months later for iOS.

The current version is a free demo without ads. This is not the finished product. Tap Legend is currently in an Alpha state, as not all main features have been implemented yet. See /r/helmersoft/,  as well as our YouTube channel for more updates regarding Tap Legend! Feel free to give us your feedback! We read all of it and will continue to do so to the best of our abilities. It really helps improve the game drastically.

This product is not associated with any other rhythm games, such as Guitar Hero, Clone Hero, or the upcoming Project Note Hitter.
